LanguageData.SMYH.summary.tooltip: Click on a mod-name to filter the list to only show weapons from that mod
LanguageData.SMYH.uiscale.label: INFO \nUI-scale is not set to 1.0x. The settings GUI will look strange for some weapons.
LanguageData.SMYH.uiscale.tooltip: Some weapons need to be rotated as their texture dose not have the default angle. The rotation-function has issues when the UI-scale is set to anything else than 1.0x. It does not need to be changed for the settings to have effect.
LanguageData.SMYH.copy.label: Copy manual values
LanguageData.SMYH.copy.tooltip: Copies the changed values to a XML-format that can be used to create better default definitions
LanguageData.SMYH.resetall.label: Manual config reset
LanguageData.SMYH.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.SMYH.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.SMYH.matcharmor.label: Try to match armor color
LanguageData.SMYH.matcharmor.tooltip: If the pawn is wearing an armor that covers the hands, the color of the hands will try to match the armors color
LanguageData.SMYH.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
LanguageData.SMYH.error.weapon: Error, could not find weapon {0} in the database
LanguageData.SMYH.error.hands: Error, could not find handinfo of {0} in the database
LanguageData.SMYH.error.texture: Error, could not find texture info of {0} in the database
LanguageData.SMYH.twohands.label: Uses two hands
LanguageData.SMYH.mainhandhorizontal.label: Main hand horizontal
LanguageData.SMYH.mainhandvertical.label: Main hand vertical
LanguageData.SMYH.renderbehind.label: Render behind weapon
LanguageData.SMYH.offhandhorizontal.label: Off hand horizontal
LanguageData.SMYH.offhandvertical.label: Off hand vertical
LanguageData.SMYH.resetsingle.confirm: This will remove any saved hand-setting for the weapon and reload the default settings
LanguageData.SMYH.resetall.confirm: This will remove ALL saved hand-setting for ALL weapons and reload the default settings
LanguageData.SMYH.resetselected.confirm: This will remove all saved hand-setting for the mod {0}
LanguageData.SMYH.weaponrow.cyan: Has custom settings included in the mod
LanguageData.SMYH.weaponrow.green: Has personal settings defined by the player
